definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Reshetnikov was a celebrated Soviet pilot who fought on the Eastern Front in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 列舍特尼科夫是2戰中東線戰線的著名蘇聯飛行員。

sentences.english: Narrator: Froggy want to be a pilot, he want to fly plane.
sentences.chinese: 想當一個飛行員，他想開飛機。

sentences.english: Kerri: Yeah, he has a private pilot's license.
sentences.chinese: 會，他有私人飛行員執照。

sentences.english: This therefore frees the pilot to concentrate on his intended tasks during the combat.
sentences.chinese: 這樣可以將飛行員在戰時解放出來更關注於他的任務。

sentences.english: It can also be flown into areas that are under fire without risk to aircrew.
sentences.chinese: 它也能在不危及飛行員生命的情況下飛進交戰區域裏。

sentences.english: The check list(checklist) is similar to what airplane pilots use before takeoffs set(and) landings.
sentences.chinese: 清單類似於飛機飛行員在起飛和着陸前做什麼。

sentences.english: It was originally designed for the pilot Clone Wars micro-series.
sentences.chinese: 它原本是爲《克隆人戰爭》微系列劇的飛行員設計的。

sentences.english: The airman bold ly jump from the airplane with his parachute.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員帶着降落傘勇敢地跳下飛機。

sentences.english: But it's also a kind of pilot for IPL, Infiniti Performance Line.
sentences.chinese: 但這也是一種向量的飛行員英菲尼迪目前性能就行了。

sentences.english: Many of his world-mates also served as Alliance starfighter pilots in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 他的許多同胞也在戰鬥中擔任同盟星際戰鬥機飛行員。

sentences.english: One pilot injured, one missing after aircraft plummets at NW China air show.
sentences.chinese: 西北飛豹戰機表演時墜毀飛行員一生一失蹤。

sentences.english: She is a capable pilot, and a shrewd leader.
sentences.chinese: 她是出色的飛行員和賢明的領導者。

sentences.english: If I remember correctly, you were intent on becoming a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 如果我沒記錯的話，你當時想當個飛行員。

sentences.english: The pilot of the fighter plane even declares a near-collision.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥機的飛行員甚至還宣稱跟它有近距離碰觸。

sentences.english: As a self-respecting fighter pilot , that's all I'll say on that subject.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名有自尊的戰鬥機飛行員，我要說的就這麼多。

sentences.english: A stewardess gives a pilot a hand as they disembark in France.
sentences.chinese: 飛機在法國降落後，一位空姐扶飛行員下飛機。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
